abstract: United States stock market ends broadly lower, after week of mostly light trading in advance of long Easter holiday weekend.
lead_paragraph: United States benchmark crude fell below $39 a barrel, rekindling jitters about emerging market producer countries and firms.

headline.main: Falling Oil Prices Bring End to Rally for the Market
headline.print_headline: Sliding Financials Help Bring an End to Rally

snippet: United States benchmark crude fell below $39 a barrel, rekindling jitters about emerging market producer countries and firms.
